title: Geometry Wars™ 3
description: Enjoy the next chapter in the award-winning Geometry Wars franchise and battle through waves of enemies in this frenetic arcade shooter  Key features include: -Over 50 single player levels including Adventure and Classic Arcade modes -3D grids and over 10 battle modes including Pacifism, King and Claustrophobia - 4 unique companion drones such as Attack, Collector, Ram and Snipe -Cooperative and Online Competitive Multiplayer modes -Community and Friend Leaderboards  In addition players can enjoy a unique bonus level built specifically for Xbox: -"Titan Box" level:  Titans on a cube shaped grid and Xbox green background   The "Blood Count" level - a unique Torus shaped grid - is also available free for download until December 3rd, 2014 at 7:59 AM UTC.

childDownloads.title: Trial Game - Geometry Wars³ Dimensions

Key features include: Over 50 single player levels including Adventure and Classic Arcade modes - 3D grids and over 10 battle modes including Pacifism, King and Claustrophobia - 4 unique companion drones such as Attack, Collector, Ram and Snipe - Cooperative and Online Competitive Multiplayer modes - Community and Friend Leader boards.
